channel.title: My Levels, and Leveling
channel.description:
Hey,
My source is Testscape based. my max stat used to be 135.. but i accidently changed it. so it was 119. i changed it back, then it was 116, and if i leave my player standing there, his stats slowly decrease...
also, whenever i level, there is a 3 second delay.
help?
thanks in advance,
Foz

item.title: My Levels, and Leveling
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Remake your account, its happened to me, means its totally screwed (delete you charecter, then remake him) easier than editing levels, because that may still decrease

Read full topic
